body:
The autoheader and autoscan tools of autoconf-2.69 and 2.62 need fixes to pass all tests when using Perl 5.17+
and a test case needs an update for passing with libtool 2.4.3+
    
The failures were shown by the testsuite and the fixes are what   upstream autoconf use.
Gentoo and others use the needed patches, which are from 2017, so they are well-established:  
http://mirrors.mit.edu/gentoo-portage/sys-devel/autoconf/files/
title: autoconf: Fix 2.69 and 2.62 to pass the testsuite
